template.title: th_lost_password_parentalcontrol

template.body_html:
{xen:phrase th_parent_lost_password_body_html_parentalcontrol, 'username={$user.username}', 'board={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

{xen:link 'canonical:account/parental-control/lost-password/confirm', '', 'c={$confirmation.confirmation_key}'}
{xen:link 'canonical:account/parental-control/lost-password/confirm', '', 'c={$confirmation.confirmation_key}'}

{xen:phrase ignore_email_if_not_requested}

{xen:phrase thanks}
{$xenOptions.boardTitle}

template.title: th_lost_password_reset_parentalcontrol
template.subject: {xen:phrase th_parent_lost_password_reset_subject_parentalcontrol, "boardTitle={$boardTitle}"}

{xen:phrase password}:

template.title: th_parent_email_confirmation_parentalcontrol
template.subject: {xen:phrase th_parent_email_confirmation_subject_parentalcontrol, "boardTitle={$boardTitle}"}
template.body_html:
{xen:phrase th_parent_email_confirmation_body_html_parentalcontrol, 'username={$user.username}', 'board={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

template.title: th_user_link_confirmation_parentalcontrol
template.subject: {xen:phrase th_user_email_confirmation_subject_parentalcontrol, "boardTitle={$boardTitle}"}
template.body_html:
{xen:phrase th_user_email_confirmation_body_html_parentalcontrol, 'username={$user.username}', 'parentEmail={$user.parent_email}', 'board={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

{xen:link 'canonical:account/parental-control/confirmation-email', '', 'u={$user.user_id}', 'c={$confirmation.confirmation_key}'}

{xen:phrase ignore_email_if_not_requested}

{$xenOptions.boardTitle}

phrases.phrase: Options for the Parental Control by ThemeHouse add-on.
Limits that can be set by parents
Permissions that can be revoked by parents
Download a log file listing the activity of this user account and all linked accounts for the last month.
Parental control email address entered is incorrect.
This cannot be the same email address as this account but can be associated with a different account. A confirmation email will be sent to this address.
This email will be sent to {email}.
Parent email address must not be the same as the account email address.
Parent of {username}, in order to complete your parental control setup at {board}, you need to confirm your email address by following the link below.
Parent of {username}, in order to reset your parental control password at {board}, you need to click the link below. This will generate a new password that will be emailed to you.
Parent of {username}, your parental control password at {board} has been reset. You may log in using the password listed below.
The date of birth set here will be used to restrict access to age-related features on this site. A date of birth that can be made visible in the profile can be set on the Personal Details screen.

Your parental control setup is currently awaiting confirmation. Confirmation was sent to {parentEmail}.
Resend Confirmation Email
Are you sure you want to disable parental control for {name}?
Are you sure you want to resend the parental control confirmation email? Any previous account confirmation emails will no longer function.
Thanks for registering for parental control. In order to complete your registration, you must follow the link in the email that has been sent to you.
This account does not require confirmation.
{username}, {parentEmail} has requested to add and manage parental controls on your account at {board}. You need to confirm this request by following the link below.
{username}'s account is now under parental control, managed by {parent_email}.
Your account is now under parental control, managed by {parent_email}.
Your email address could not be confirmed. Please check that you are logged in as the correct user and try again.
The contact details provided here will be used should we see extreme behavior from or at the affected accounts.

<xen:title>{xen:phrase lost_password}</xen:title>
<form action="{xen:link 'account/parental-control/lost-password/lost'}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay"> {xen:phrase if_forgotten_your_password_use_form_to_reset}
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase reset_password}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<!DOCTYPE html> <html id="XenForo" lang="{$visitorLanguage.language_code}" dir="{$visitorLanguage.text_direction}"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <xen:if is="{$requestPaths.fullBasePath}"> <base href="{$requestPaths.fullBasePath}" /> <script><xen:comment>/* Chrome bug and for Google cache */</xen:comment> var _b = document.getElementsByTagName('base')[0], _bH = "{xen:jsescape $requestPaths.fullBasePath}"; if (_b && _b.href != _bH) _b.href = _bH; </script> </xen:if>
<title><xen:if is="{$title}">{xen:raw $title} | {$xenOptions.boardTitle}<xen:else />{$xenOptions.boardTitle}</xen:if></title>
<style> .JsOnly { display: none !important; } html { min-width: auto !important; } .searchResult { padding: 10px !important; } </style> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css.php?css=xenforo&style={xen:urlencode $_styleId}&dir={$visitorLanguage.text_direction}&d={$visitorStyle.last_modified_date}" /> <!--XenForo_Require:CSS--> </head>
<body> {xen:raw $contents} </body> </html>
